entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
